meanings.definition: A child of one's son or daughter.
meanings.sent1: My grandchild loves to play with toys.
meanings.sent2: She visits her grandchild every weekend.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous grandchild hid all the cookies.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like a grandchild's joy.
meanings.sent5: The grandchild's smile lit up the whole house.

meanings.sent1: The king's grandchild inherited the throne.
meanings.sent2: He traced his family tree to find his grandchild.
meanings.sent3: The grandchild of the ancient warrior had his bravery.
meanings.sent4: The grandchild of tradition carried on the legacy.
meanings.sent5: The grandchild of time, the old oak tree stood tall.
